title: Neetu Turns Film Producer
text:
Email 0 
Actor Neetu Chandra, who impressed Tamil audiences with her performances in Yaavarum Nalam (which was directed by Vikram Kumar and featured Madhavan in the lead ) and Ameer’s Aadhi Bhagawan (which featured Jayam Ravi in the lead), has now turned a producer of a film, Once upon a Time in Bihar. A trailer of the film, which is to hit screens on October 30 this year, was released recently and is already making waves on social networking websites. Sources say the film’s story, which is based on real incidents, is set in 2003-2004 and happens in the ravenous terrains of Buxar in Bihar. The film, that has been directed by Nitin Neera Chandra, features at least three new comers. Several Tamil actors, including Arya, have been congratulating the actress on her new role. Neetu Chandra herself seems to be proud of the effort. The actress tweeted, “Proud of my first film as producer. In cinemas on October 30.”
